script_variables.SCRATCH_FLUPS: path to scratch directory for FLUPS
script_variables.FLUPS_DIR: path to the directory containing the FLUPS samples
script_variables.EXEC_FLUPS: name of the executable file for FLUPS
script_variables.NPROC_X: number of processes in the x dimension
script_variables.NPROC_Y: number of processes in the y dimension
script_variables.NPROC_Z: number of processes in the z dimension
script_variables.NGLOB_X: global size of the domain in the x dimension
script_variables.NGLOB_Y: global size of the domain in the y dimension
script_variables.NGLOB_Z: global size of the domain in the z dimension
script_variables.L_X: size of the local domain in the x dimension
script_variables.L_Y: size of the local domain in the y dimension
script_variables.L_Z: size of the local domain in the z dimension
